sources.title: The Texas Kid (1943)
sources.description: Marshals Nevada and Sandy are after Scully and his gang who have been robbing stage-coaches. The Texas Kid is part of the gang and Sandy thinks he is bad but Nevada knows him and thinks he may be good. Watch on RetroFlix:Â

sources.title: The Texas Kid (1943) JOHNNY MACK BROWN
sources.description:
Stars: Johnny Mack Brown, Raymond Hatton, Marshall Reed 
Director: Lambert Hillyer

A pair of Marshals are after a gang that includes the Texas Kid, who have been robbing stage-coaches.

metadata.Plot: Marshals Nevada and Sandy are after Scully and his gang who have been robbing stage-coaches. The Texas Kid is part of the gang and Sandy thinks he is bad but Nevada knows him and thinks he may be good.
metadata.Actors: Johnny Mack Brown, Raymond Hatton, Marshall Reed
